name: Karleigh Paolacci
coverLetter: I am a passionate cannabis floater-cultivator-trimmer of 3 and a half years. I was just working for an amazing company called Yerba Buena and worked all over their operation, mostly head of their production. I am seeking other opportunities in the industry and am able to start as soon as possible. I am a positive, easy going gal that loves farming and gardening. Flexible and hard worker!
